{{ phrase('QT_watched_question_email_html_footer', { 'thread': '' . $thread.title . '', 'board': $xf.options.boardTitle, 'disable_this_link': link('canonical:email-stop/content', $xf.toUser, {'t': 'thread', 'id': $thread.thread_id}), 'disable_all_link': link('canonical:email-stop/all', $xf.toUser) }) }}

<xf:if is="{{ $forum->QT_type === 'threads_questions' }}"> <hr class="formRowSep" /> <xf:radiorow name="QT_question" label="{{ phrase('type') }}" value="0"> <xf:option value="0" label="{{ phrase('thread') }}" /> <xf:option value="1" label="{{ phrase('question') }}" disabled="{{ (!$forum->canCreateQuestion()) ? 'disabled' : '' }}" hint="{{ (!$forum->canCreateQuestion()) ? phrase('QT_create_question_no_permission') : '' }}" /> </xf:radiorow> </xf:if>

<xf:selectrow name="QT_type" value="{$forum.QT_type}" label="{{ phrase('QT_forum_type') }}"> <xf:option value="threads_only">{{ phrase('QT_threads_only') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="threads_questions">{{ phrase('QT_threads_and_questions') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="questions_only">{{ phrase('QT_questions_only') }}</xf:option> </xf:selectrow>
<xf:checkboxrow> <xf:option name="QT_convert_threads" label="{{ phrase('QT_convert_existing_threads') }}" hint="{{ phrase('QT_convert_threads_hint') }}" /> </xf:checkboxrow>

<xf:checkboxrow label="{{ phrase('QT_question_threads') }}">
<xf:option name="user_criteria[QT_questions_posted][rule]" value="QT_questions_posted" selected="{$criteria.QT_questions_posted}" label="{{ phrase('QT_user_has_posted_at_least_x_questions:') }}"> <xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[QT_questions_posted][data][questions]" value="{$criteria.QT_questions_posted.questions}" size="5" min="0" step="1" /> </xf:option>
<xf:option name="user_criteria[QT_questions_maximum][rule]" value="QT_questions_maximum" selected="{$criteria.QT_questions_maximum}" label="{{ phrase('QT_user_has_posted_no_more_than_x_questions:') }}"> <xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[QT_questions_maximum][data][questions]" value="{$criteria.QT_questions_maximum.questions}" size="5" min="0" step="1" /> </xf:option>
<xf:option name="user_criteria[QT_best_answer_count][rule]" value="QT_best_answer_count" selected="{$criteria.QT_best_answer_count}" label="{{ phrase('QT_user_has_posted_at_least_x_best_answers:') }}"> <xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[QT_best_answer_count][data][best_answers]" value="{$criteria.QT_best_answer_count.best_answers}" size="5" min="0" step="1" /> </xf:option>
<xf:option name="user_criteria[QT_best_answer_ratio][rule]" value="QT_best_answer_ratio" selected="{$criteria.QT_best_answer_ratio}" label="{{ phrase('QT_user_best_answer_to_answer_ratio_is_at_least:') }}"> <xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[QT_best_answer_ratio][data][ratio]" value="{$criteria.QT_best_answer_ratio.ratio}" size="5" min="0" step="0.25" /> <xf:afterhint>{{ phrase('QT_best_answer_ratio_explanation') }}</xf:afterhint> </xf:option>
</xf:checkboxrow>
<hr class="formRowSep" />
<!--[QT:user:after_QT]-->
{{ phrase('QT_best_answer') }} {$_QT_classes}

{{ phrase('QT_x_best_answers', {'name': $user.username}) }} {$user.username}

  • {{ prefix('thread', $post.Thread) . highlight($post.Thread.title, $options.term) }}

    {{ snippet($post.message, 300, {'term': $options.term, 'stripQuote': true}) }}
    • {{ phrase('post_x', {'position': number($post.position + 1)}) }}
    • {{ phrase('forum:') }} {$post.Thread.Forum.title}
    •
{{ phrase('QT_unfortunately_you_dont_have_best_answers') }} {{ phrase('QT_user_does_not_have_best_answers') }}

<xf:if is="{{ $thread->canEditType() }}"> <xf:formrow rowtype="{{ $quickEdit ? 'fullWidth' : '' }}" label="{{ phrase('type') }}"> <xf:radio name="QT_question" value="{$thread.QT_question}"> <xf:option value="0" label="{{ phrase('thread') }}" /> <xf:option value="1" label="{{ phrase('question') }}" /> </xf:radio> </xf:formrow> </xf:if>
{{ phrase('QT_best_answer') }} {{ phrase('QT_not_best_answer') }}

<xf:if is="$thread.QT_question"> <xf:if is="{{ $thread.QT_best_answer_id === $post.post_id }}"> <xf:if is="{{ property('QT_best_answer_message_type') === 'indicator' }}"> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="best_answer_indicator" /> </xf:if> </xf:if> </xf:if>

{{ phrase('QT_question_x_solved', { 'title': prefix('thread', $thread, 'escaped') . $thread.title }) }} {{ phrase('QT_watched_question_solved_email_html', { 'receiver': $receiver.username, 'sender': username_link_email($sender, $sender.username), 'board': '' . $xf.options.boardTitle . '' }) }}

{{ prefix('thread', $thread, 'escaped') }}{$thread.title}

{{ bb_code_type('emailHtml', $post.message, 'post', $post) }}
<xf:if is="$post.Thread.QT_best_answer_id === $post.post_id"> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="best_answer_mark" arg-thread="{$post.Thread}" /> </xf:if>

<xf:if is="$thread.QT_question"> <!-- Question mark --> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="question_mark" arg-thread="{$thread}" />
<!-- Best answer icon --> <xf:if is="$thread.QT_best_answer_id"> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="best_answer_mark" arg-thread="{$thread}" /> </xf:if> </xf:if>

<xf:checkboxrow rowclass="{$rowClass}" label="{$titleHtml}" hint="{$hintHtml}" explain="{$property.description}">
<xf:option name="{$formBaseKey}[member_profile_page]" selected="{$property.property_value.member_profile_page}"> {{ phrase('QT_member_profile_page') }} </xf:option> <xf:option name="{$formBaseKey}[member_account_menu]" selected="{$property.property_value.member_account_menu}"> {{ phrase('QT_member_account_menu') }} </xf:option> </xf:checkboxrow>

<xf:if is="{{ $thread->canEditType() }}"> <xf:radiorow name="QT_question" label="{{ phrase('type') }}" value="{$thread.QT_question}"> <xf:option value="0" label="{{ phrase('thread') }}" /> <xf:option value="1" label="{{ phrase('question') }}" /> </xf:radiorow> </xf:if>

<xf:if is="$thread.QT_question"> <!-- Question mark --> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="question_mark" arg-thread="{$thread}" />
<!-- Best answer icon --> <xf:if is="$thread.QT_best_answer_id"> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="best_answer_mark" arg-thread="{$thread}" /> </xf:if> </xf:if>

<xf:pageaction if="$thread.QT_question"> <xf:if is="{{ !$thread.QT_solved && $thread->canMarkSolved() }}"> <xf:button href="{{ link('threads/markSolved', $thread) }}" class="QT_pageaction_solved" icon="confirm"> {{ phrase('QT_mark_solved') }} </xf:button> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $thread.QT_solved && $thread->canMarkUnsolved() }}"> <xf:button href="{{ link('threads/markUnsolved', $thread) }}" class="QT_pageaction_unsolved" icon="cancel"> {{ phrase('QT_mark_unsolved') }} </xf:button> </xf:if> </xf:pageaction>
<xf:if is="$thread.QT_question"> <xf:macro template="QT_macros" name="question_mark" arg-thread="{$thread}" /> </xf:if>
<xf:macro template="tools_rebuild" name="rebuild_job" arg-header="{{ phrase('QT_rebuild_best_answer_counts') }}" arg-job="QuestionThreads:RebuildBestAnswerCounts" />

{{ phrase('QT_x_marked_your_answer_best_for_y_question', { 'name': username_link($user, false, {'defaultname': $alert.username}), 'title': '' . prefix('thread', $content.Thread) . $content.Thread.title . ''}) }} {{ phrase('QT_x_selected_best_answer_for_y_question', { 'name': username_link($user, false, {'defaultname': $alert.username}), 'title': '' . prefix('thread', $content.Thread) . $content.Thread.title . ''}) }}
{{ phrase('QT_x_marked_question_y_solved', { 'name': username_link($user, false, {'defaultname': $alert.username}), 'title': '' . prefix('thread', $thread) . $content.title . ''}) }}
